events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position. Our team is currently reviewing your submitted materials and will get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and the role you applied for.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to your candidacy and will be your point of contact moving forward.
We conducted an initial screening interview to evaluate your engineering skills and cultural fit. The discussion went well, and we are interested in proceeding further.
Thank you for your prompt reply. We appreciate your enthusiasm and confirm your availability for the next round of interviews.
Your technical interview with our engineering team has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC. Please review the attached preparation materials.
